item.title: This is my first post
item.description: This is the section for content. Im just trying it out to see how it will look and feel. Because there is always some emotion in everything. Under should be a Python code block. The code is a solution to chapter 5 exercise 2 in ‘Python for everybody’ by Dr. Charles R. Severance max=None min=None while True: number = input("Enter a number: ") if number.upper() == "DONE": print(f'Max: {max}Min: {min}') break try: number=float(number) except(ValueError): print("Invalid input") continue if max is None or number > max: max = number elif min is None or number < min: min = number
